name: Rita Bowman’s Chicken Cacchiatore
ingredients: 8 oz. water or water and wine
2 cans whole San Marzano plum Tomatoes (loose chop)
instructions: Wash, dry and dip chicken in flour seasoned with salt & pepper
Fry lightly in pan with olive oil & a little butter
Add garlic, fresh rosemary and parsley
Add about 8 oz. water or water and wine
In separate pan, lightly fry 2-3 onions and 2-3 red & green peppers
Add to chicken pan with 2 cans whole San Marzano plum tomatoes (loose chop)
Simmer until chicken is ready (1 hour)
description: Italian-style chicken with tomatoes, peppers, and herbs
